servers.name: Filesystem Access
servers.description: Read and write files on the local filesystem. List directories and manage file operations safely.
servers.author: Anthropic

tools.name: read_file
tools.description: Read the contents of a file from disk

tools.name: write_file
tools.description: Write contents to a file. Creates the file if missing.

tools.name: list_directory
tools.description: List files and folders within a directory

tools.name: create_directory
tools.description: Create a new directory

servers.name: GitHub Integration
servers.description: Access GitHub repositories, create issues, search code, manage pull requests, and interact with GitHub API.
servers.author: Anthropic

tools.name: create_issue
tools.description: Create a new issue in a GitHub repository

tools.name: search_code
tools.description: Search for code across GitHub repositories

tools.name: get_file
tools.description: Get the contents of a file from a GitHub repository

tools.name: create_pull_request
tools.description: Create a new pull request

tools.name: list_repositories
tools.description: List accessible GitHub repositories

servers.name: Playwright Browser Automation
servers.description: Browser automation with Playwright. Navigate, click, type, screenshot, and interact with web pages programmatically.
servers.author: Anthropic

tools.name: playwright_navigate
tools.description: Navigate to a URL in the browser

tools.name: playwright_click
tools.description: Click an element on the page

tools.name: playwright_screenshot
tools.description: Take a screenshot of the current page

tools.name: playwright_fill
tools.description: Fill in a form field

tools.name: playwright_evaluate
tools.description: Execute JavaScript in the page context

servers.name: Google Drive
servers.description: Access Google Drive files and folders. Read, write, search, and manage documents in your Google Drive.
servers.author: Anthropic

tools.name: list_files
tools.description: List files in Google Drive

tools.name: read_file
tools.description: Read the contents of a Google Drive file

tools.name: create_file
tools.description: Create a new file in Google Drive

tools.name: update_file
tools.description: Update an existing Google Drive file

tools.name: search
tools.description: Search for files in Google Drive

servers.name: Brave Search
servers.description: Web search using Brave Search API. Get up-to-date information from the web with privacy-focused search.
servers.author: Anthropic

tools.name: web_search
tools.description: Search the web using Brave Search

tools.name: local_search
tools.description: Search for local businesses and places

servers.name: PostgreSQL Database
servers.description: Query PostgreSQL databases. Execute SQL queries, manage schemas, and access database metadata.
servers.author: Anthropic

tools.name: query
tools.description: Execute a SQL query

tools.name: schema
tools.description: Get database schema information

tools.name: execute
tools.description: Execute a SQL command (INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE)

servers.name: Slack Integration
servers.description: Post messages to Slack channels, read conversations, and manage your Slack workspace.
servers.author: Anthropic

tools.name: post_message
tools.description: Post a message to a Slack channel

tools.name: list_channels
tools.description: List available Slack channels

tools.name: read_messages
tools.description: Read recent messages from a channel

servers.name: Notion Integration
servers.description: Access Notion pages and databases. Read, create, and update notes and structured data.
servers.author: Anthropic

tools.name: search
tools.description: Search Notion workspace

tools.name: get_page
tools.description: Get a Notion page by ID

tools.name: create_page
tools.description: Create a new Notion page

tools.name: query_database
tools.description: Query a Notion database

servers.name: Google Maps
servers.description: Access Google Maps API for geocoding, directions, and place information.
servers.author: Community

tools.name: geocode
tools.description: Convert address to coordinates

tools.name: reverse_geocode
tools.description: Convert coordinates to address

tools.name: directions
tools.description: Get directions between two locations

tools.name: place_search
tools.description: Search for places nearby

servers.name: Jira Integration
servers.description: Manage Jira issues, projects, and sprints. Create, update, and query issues.
servers.author: Community

tools.name: create_issue
tools.description: Create a new Jira issue

tools.name: update_issue
tools.description: Update an existing Jira issue

tools.name: search_issues
tools.description: Search for Jira issues using JQL

tools.name: get_issue
tools.description: Get details of a specific issue
